p: The results of the cytotoxicity test indicated that epiprogoitrin, progoitrin, epigoitrin and goitrin at all investigated concentrations showed no influence on cell viability. The maximum non-toxic dose of Isatidis Radix derived glucosinolate isomers and their breakdown products on MDCK cells was 10 −3 mol/L and the CPE assay was performed at this dose and below.
